website_summaries.verdict: These rechargeable battery-powered insoles come in a variety of sizes and can be trimmed to fit any shoe.
pros: Heated with rechargeable lithium ion polymer batteries
Can be trimmed to fit almost any shoe
Includes rechargeable insoles, wireless remote control, wall plug, car charger, lanyard, and drawstring travel bag
cons: So thick they may not fit in your standard shoe

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I got these November, 2016 as a Christmas gift for my husband for deer hunting. When he received them for Christmas, 2016 deer hunting season had ended. He used them for the first time November, 2017 and they DO NOT WORK. This company does NOT stand behind their merchandise, DO NOT waste your money, purchase from someone who will stand behind what they sell.
customer_reviews.author: lora l lee

customer_reviews.title: and thought they can't be that bad.. Maybe for some
customer_reviews.text: I returned these insoles. I think they tried to work, but sitting in my tree-stand, my feet were cold. I don't mind paying the high price, if they worked. I read the other comments before buying, and thought they can't be that bad.. Maybe for some, they are OK, but I wasn't happy at all. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Nighthoghunter

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: There are some negative reviews on here and I don't know why. These are working fine for me, they keep my feet from freezing in a treestand while hunting. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gehrt

customer_reviews.title: You'll need bigger shoes
customer_reviews.text: So, I LOVE this product, so I gave it 4 stars, bc you need to know that you will not be able to use them in shoes that fit you normally. I borrowed boots 2 sizes too big for me to be able to fit these in with my foot. I just keep the bog boots in a drawer at work. They are very hard, and take up a lot of space in the shoe. But if you get cold feet and they don't warm up like mine (Raynaud's) then these are worth it. Just know you will need to get specific shoes in a larger size to wear with them
customer_reviews.author: Erica Allen

customer_reviews.title: Have to pay to return defective product
customer_reviews.text: why do I have to pay return shipping on a defective product
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a short period of time and then start Amazon sent a replacement pair which did the same thing work for a short time and then quick. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cremer

customer_reviews.title: Not eligible for return due to safty hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Probably a great item however, if you need to return it for any reason, it is not eligible for return due to safety issues. There is not anything in a disclaimer that states this before you buy it. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: 3D

customer_reviews.title: Great idea poor quality charging setup
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a week. On the second recharge, the prongs would not fit back into the receptacles. I had a pair of these for 4 years and it took that long for the receptacle/prongs to wear out. This pair--only a week. I have returned them and trying to figure out whether I should go for the replaceable battery ones. If anyone has had a positive experience with those, please let me know. Added later: I notice that Thermacell, the original maker/seller no longer advertises them on its site. Perhaps they have given up on the product--a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Cosbieman

customer_reviews.title: If you have a problem with cold feet DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I received them on November 4 2019 I used them on the 8th and the 9th in west Virginia we had a good freeze. I watched some videos about them it said turn on and off don't let them run the entire time. So I figured I would turn them on till I felt the heat.. i did not get 3 hours of on and off run time. Heated fast but didn't last long i ended up with freezing feet because I ran out of Battery. Also when I recieved the warmers I had to replace the battery in the remote it was dead. I was not happy with the product for the money it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My name is neither Bill nor Ted, but everything about the ThermaCELL heated insoles I snagged up here was, indeed, excellent! The packaging appeared new. The insoles were not used at all. I know this because the minute I stuffed them into my boots and removed them, permanent wrinkles were evident. The transaction went smoothly. They have taken a charge, but I haven't had to use them even though I've been ice fishing in -5* Green Bay temperatures, but I did test their operation. Flawless.
customer_reviews.author: J. Firestone

customer_reviews.title: Worthless these only worked for a few months / horrible customer support
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved these as they kept your feet fairly warm on cold days in the woods, unfortunately the remote stopped working a few months later. I contacted customer support at Thermacell only to learn after a few weeks that they sold the company to HeatfactoryUSA. After several attempts to contact them via their web portal and email for customer support, I haven't heard anything back. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Martin

customer_reviews.title: Plus they are super hard, not something usuable for people who have ...
customer_reviews.text: These do not heat AT ALL! Plus they are super hard, not something usuable for people who have a neuropathy can use. I have tried to get a refund from the seller and am hoping they will respond SOON, but have not heard from them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heated insoles don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 2 other pairs of older style Thermacell inserts without the remote. I purchased this pair thinking newer, better and best part remote on or off. Well I hate to say, but the older version worked a lot better than the newer version. I'm pretty disappointed with the heating temp of the insoles. i ride my bike outdoors all winter long. This is the first time i have had to think about how cold my feet were getting while riding. I wanted to return the insoles but was told out out of the date range:(. Personally would not recommend these heated insoles.
customer_reviews.author: dean daniel

customer_reviews.title: Changed the way I felt about cleaning snow on car
customer_reviews.text: I have never been a fan of winter particularly clearing the snow off my car , and moving it away from my condo when it was time to have the parking lot plowed the walk back from street parking meant cold feet. This product made a significant difference in my comfort level. I learned about these insoles from a friend who has a consistently cold floor and she uses them in her slippers - they were Christmas present she couldn't stop raving about ! I am so glad I took her recommendation
customer_reviews.author: Janice Book

customer_reviews.title: Keep your feet warm
customer_reviews.text: I would have give 5 stars but one of the insoles stays warm for only about 3/4 of the time that the other does. But still these are great to have in your boots when temps are freezing. Nothing makes a sitting in a tree stand in cold weather more miserable than frozen toes. The remote control for on/off, hi/lo setting is a really nice feature. I can turn the soles off while walking and on while sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle A

customer_reviews.title: couldn't get them in.......
customer_reviews.text: I bought them with hopes of using them in my ski boots to keep warm, of course. The problem was that I couldn't even get them in the boots because I couldn't bend them and slide them in. And I was really hoping they'd work!
customer_reviews.author: Betteboop

customer_reviews.title: These work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in my boots that I wear to football games in New England winter. Standing on concrete for 3+ hours, your feet will get cold. Cold feet can ruin your day and make you want to leave early. I’ve tried numerous combinations of shoes, boots and socks but nothing really worked. I decided to give these a try and have been very happy. I was worried that they would be uncomfortable because they are fairly stiff, but they were as comfortable as any other shoe insert I’ve tried, gel or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for ski boots
customer_reviews.text: I tried these for my ski boots. They do not bend much, and it was near impossible to get them in my boots. It would have been even more difficult to get them out to charge them and back in another time to reuse them. I decided that it was not worth using them, and as they didn't meet the requirements I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: alex b

customer_reviews.title: it is a fine product. and works fine
customer_reviews.text: Charging function doesn't work consistently...i.e. need to wiggle and jiggle the plugs to keep contact. But, it is a fine product. and works fine..wish they could make a flexible insole with the same features.
customer_reviews.author: John Vinton

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for most people and situations
customer_reviews.text: Work great, but wish they had longer battery life. I work in frozen foods and it’s inconvenient to keep turning them off and on to save battery life. I also wear prescription insoles and these cause some pain by the end of the day, with or without the prescription ones. They do keep feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamac

customer_reviews.title: lasts for hours
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for a friend who works outside in winter. He loves them. they are warm and toasty, lasts for hours. The fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Penny N.

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment. I Cant Even Feel Them On
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and still bought them. My mistske. I work outdoors For a utility company. Big Disappointment. I Cant Even Feel Them On. Maybe I Got A Bad Pair. Dont Waste Your Money.
customer_reviews.author: kindle fire owner

customer_reviews.title: It works, but I regret buying it
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review, but this occasion warranted one. I wear a shoe/boot size 10-10 1/2 and I purchased an XL. Not only are the inserts too long even after they are cut, but they are too thick. Unfortunately, my feet can no longer fit into my shoes with the inserts. Since I've cut them per ThermaCell's instructions, I can't return them. Maybe the next size down would allow my foot to fit into my own shoes, but I doubt it. Now, I can only use them out shoes... which kind of defeats the purpose. I guess I'll have to live with the consequences of my actions.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son who really suffers with cold feet. He used them to go to an NFL game on a very cold night and he LOVED them. He has no complaints about them and is thrilled to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not a very long life with the battery. It’s very stiff and not comfortable if you work outside in the winter. It’s a great concept and it works for a shorter period of time, but then it is done
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Work for my oil field husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. He has poor circulation for starters and works out in the cold weather on an oil rig. Haven’t heard him complain about his feet being cold since I found these. And if they didn’t work, I would hear about! His silence says it all. So worth it knowing he feels more comfortable. Bought two pairs and both work.
customer_reviews.author: KattKombs

customer_reviews.title: Worked a couple times now doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for deer hunting in Ohio. They worked pretty well for maybe half the season. They now dont work. I dont know if they dont charge or just dont turn on. reguardless my feet froze while hunting and i found out the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Still worth it , better than heat packs
customer_reviews.text: They work great ! Just they seem to get compacted or squished thinner (so eventually you can feel where the heat pads are and they get a little less comfortable) but worth it on the days you cant feel your toes!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These suck!! Cut to my shoe size and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These suck!! Cut to my shoe size and they are so thick that you can't get your foot in your shoes. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: they no longer charge or heat only lasted 6 weeks very disatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're good.....
customer_reviews.text: I bet when worn outdoor they're great keeping feet warm but I'm actually using them in my house slippers and they don't seem to really 'heat' up, like I was hoping. I do think they are warming but I was looking for an instant noticeable heat.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last long enough
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy about these. When I use them the battery only lasted about fifteen minutes. I thought the battery would last longer. Can't use them for hunting cause if you don't turn then on right away the battery is dead before you even get to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Company does not stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.text: Sucks. Lasts 2 hours on medium. The company Thermacell, asked for all my purchase information after I informed them that the insoles do not last anywhere near what they are advertised to. I sent them all the info and they refuse to answer me after several attempts.
customer_reviews.author: robert smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Seems like one sole is not working, I e mailed the company with no response back. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Eric Zink

customer_reviews.title: Least comfortable insoles I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Least comfortable insoles I have ever used. They get warm but instead of being a wire element integrated into the insole the heating element is a hard pad directly under the ball of your foot. I wore them for about two hours before it became too uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Berman

customer_reviews.title: The hurt and they did not last - Returned
customer_reviews.text: So very uncomfortable and they did not heat to any worthwhile temperature to combat freezing feet. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: alsatian5

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on these!
customer_reviews.text: They don't produce enough heat to be worth $1 I decided to o my wear one pair of wool socks with these, but my toes were freezing. Dr. Shollz inserts and double wool socks keep my feet much warmer, than these "heated insoles" And it sais I cannot get my money back. Don't waste your money on this product! Get yourself extra pairs of wool socks!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Makes most shoes too small to wear.
customer_reviews.text: These make normal shoes VERY hard to wear. My husband was able to use them in his boots, but it made them very snug. He couldn't use them in any other shoe, just makes them way too snug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work second year
customer_reviews.text: The first year I used these only 3 or 4 times. They provided enough heat to make a difference. However, this year when I plug them in to charge the green light goes on as it should....but, it never goes off. I don't get any warmth when I put them in the shoes and turn them High. I think at the price these cost they should last for more than a few uses, even if it is over a two year period.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Great if they lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: Product works great for activities like hunting or ice fishing. Working as a carpenter these lasted total about 12 uses before they quit on me. Not sure what the issue was, could be too much movement and broke internal wires. When this product did work they were amazing. The remote controlled on/off is a huge upgrade from batteries on the ankle for heated socks. Trying the flexible heated insoles from the same company now.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay heated more than 30-45 minutes. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept. Hard time fitting my foot and insole in the boot at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Heats up decent. Super easy to charge. Remote works well. Haven't gotten to the cold part of winter but idid have a hard time fitting them in my boots though even when trimming them and removing any other liners. Really squished my foot and was cutting off the circulation. Tried it in four different pairs of boots. Merrell,Columbia, and bogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I could give these -100 stars I would. ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give these -100 stars I would. I bought them for my husband who works outside year round. In Negative degree temoetures. They turned on one time. Never got warm and have not turned on since. We have charged them we replaced the battery in the remote and still nothing. So very upset and frustrating
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: These don't last at all
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 pairs in our house and our neighbor has a pair. The first time I turned mine on, it never heated up. The battery shows it's charged and the remote glows when pressed. My husband and friend's pair worked for a while and now not at all. They all had to be thrown out! What a waste of money. Too bad great idea if it only worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen G. Bodilly

customer_reviews.title: Only works a few times!
customer_reviews.text: this pair works great for a handful of times.. then the batteries no longer charge. Plus then, you need to contact customer service of the company for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lobat O.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 11 days, then one died.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 11 days and one quit taking a charge. Charging ports are tiny, and did not have a method of tension on the charging plug to hold in place. Having to remove from my shoes to charge nightly was inconvenient. The time they did work was great could feel the heat on high, lasted about 2-3 hours. For $80 I expected more, returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought ThermaCell from Amazon and got it right away but when I used it, it didn’t work. So I called Amazon and asked for warranty and they said that they will just give me a refund, and I bought again, thinking that I might have gotten the bad one, so I tried again and I did and it was the same. I can’t even feel the warmness. I tried to do everything from the instruction but it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Terrible Terrible Company
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these 18 months ago. They did not work when they arrived. I called for help and all I could get was a distribution center, multiple claims that replacements would ship and after 7 calls including with the manager of the distribution center I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Gardner L.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these they stop working and you can’t even return them 👎🏼 (Even from Amazon)
customer_reviews.author: Taaasha Smith

customer_reviews.title: he should have listened
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my son in law I told him I wasn't happy last year when I purchased them he felt maybe I had a defective pair and wanted to try them. he should have listened left insole worked for maybe two hours right insole worked for maybe 3 this was on low setting description says 5 hours
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps your tootsies warm during the winter.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses the heated insoles while working out in the forest during the snowy season and he says his toes stays nice and warm! He likes the fact that it comes with a clicker to turn them on and adjust heat temperature. Just plugs them in at night to charge them up and he's ready to go the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Katia Arquette

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t waste your money! You never know when you hit the remote to turn on if they come on. I was so disappointed you do not feel any heat even out of the boot with your hand on them. You are better off with the disposable toe warmers. And yes I tried different weight socks it made no difference. I’m sure I’ve spent 80 bucks on worst things I just can’t think of what it was!
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: great warm happy feet
customer_reviews.text: These insoles really do heat. I do wish that there was a way to turn them on without the remote (i left it in my other jacket) but being able to flip them on during the long ride up the mountain and off on the way down is great. The batteries worked for 2 full days of skiing. I have a W8.5 sized foot and the small was a tiny short for my tennis shoes but fit great in my ski boots. Careful on the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Pursuit

customer_reviews.title: Not in love with them, but they do the job.
customer_reviews.text: It has two settings medium and high. I'm fine with two settings, but I'll never use high, as it kinda stings. So, I wish the "Medium" was the high, and they had a lower setting. This would also increase the battery life between charges, which would be nice. They are comfortable to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: SClark

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a few times and They never worked and can’t get In touch with anyone to discuss
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet warm!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my feet warm!!!! This is my second pair. And will buy more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: mtpinetree406

customer_reviews.title: Works but battery sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn't last long...maybe a few hours. When they are working...they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband works in the weather as a welder. Purchased for Christmas 2016, used most of the winter and some winter 2017. Got them out to use winter 2018 and one insole works and the other one does not work. Went thru the entire manual and still nothing. Worst product every bought.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: they make your boots fit tight
customer_reviews.text: these are higher (thicker) than normal inserts for boots or shoes there for in work boots makes the top of the foot area tight and for me it makes it so i cant wear my boots comfortably. I bought them, sized them and never used them.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Straub

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great for hunting. Make sure your boots can handle a thicker sole. Use time is pretty good too
customer_reviews.author: derik

customer_reviews.title: The battery or remote neither one worked and I wasn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery or remote neither one worked and I wasn’t able to use the product! Had to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Raburn

customer_reviews.title: Should have got these years ago
customer_reviews.text: Had them over a week now and have used them everyday (single digit temps). So far so good, I go quite a while before feet get chilled but in a matter of minutes they are warm. I have only used the low selector but that's all that is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: He says they work well and I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves them! It was just what he wanted! He says they work well and I would highly recommend this product! It came in a timely manner also.
customer_reviews.author: cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband for Christmas. He hasn’t been able to use them yet so I’m hoping they work this fall. I’m giving a five star because my dad has them and loves them. Once he tries them I will come back and update my review
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Faulty recharge
customer_reviews.text: Right sole does not recharge, worked OK for about a week. Left seems to work fine, unfortunately would like both feet to stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jan G.

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life
customer_reviews.text: I just love them. I live in Ohio, and we had a rough winter for 2013-14. Schools were closed more than open because of the snow and freezing temps. I really needed these for when I plow snow because of sitting on the tractor my toes get cold. It is so nice to turn on the heat and I don't have to worry about my toes. I can work longer without the worry of taking a break and defrosting my toes. Thank you ThermaCELL.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So convenient to be able to turn on & off as needed. They fit perfectly inside my boots.
customer_reviews.author: VOLFAN

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They work great!! My husband works outside they kept his feet warm!
customer_reviews.author: Helen J.

customer_reviews.title: Things suck
customer_reviews.text: Literally take your hundred dollars and spend it on nails. Pound those nails into wood. Step on the pointed ends, then duct tape your feet to the wood. This would be a 100 times better choice than buying these pieces of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Never got warm and you can’t return because of lithium battery don’t even spend your money on this.... it’s a great ide but doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good solution for cold feet
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my fiancé who has chronically cold feet (in the literal sense, I hope). He says they kept his feet warm during the cold and snowy Pennsylvania winter. He says the remote control came in handy and is kind of fun to use, especially during meetings.
customer_reviews.author: MLou365

customer_reviews.title: Lots of warmth feet at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I’ve been struggling to find something for my feet that work in extreme cold and is reasonably priced. These are perfect for me and keep my feet comfortable while working outside for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Velez

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: After owning two pair (one was a replacement), heating mechanism didn't work after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ladd E.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: Really mixed feeling about these. I loved the idea and really hoped they had worked. They just did not get warm enough to do me any good. I went ahead and returned them. As technology improves, I hope they can get a product that will get warmer and last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Loves Me

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: They were pretty awesome for the first couple of wears. It seems as though the life of the battery diminishes greatly every wear. Worn about a dozen times, battery dies within an hour now. Absolutely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but outstanding quality and love the remote to control heat
customer_reviews.text: If you are an outdoors person in a colder climate you need to but these. Not cheap but outstanding quality and love the remote to control heat.
customer_reviews.author: ricksc03

customer_reviews.title: Cold Weather
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cover entire foot so the toes start to get cold. I never got cold in 15degree weather but when I was in -10 it seemed like the insoles were delayed in their activation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for hunters and folks working outside in the winter months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband who is a hunter. This is his second set so he can keep one set in the truck at all times and one set in his hunting boots. Great value and works very well to keep feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndia Newburn

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of heated soles. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Furman

customer_reviews.title: Soles are too hard. Save your money and keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Soles are too hard. Save your money and keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Robian

customer_reviews.title: These things won't warm your feet up if they are ...
customer_reviews.text: These things won't warm your feet up if they are already cold but they will keep your feet warm a lot longer. I usually leave my stand early due to cold feet, not this year.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Arneson

customer_reviews.title: Finally my feet are warm on in the snow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow these things are fantastic. I can't believe after all these years of living on the East Coast in the winter that my feet are finally warm. Yi! It took these guys to do it, honestly!.
customer_reviews.author: hawkcaller

customer_reviews.title: Hot feet!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well, remote so you don't need to take off your boots to turn them on! I suggest not turning them on while walking around or working as you probably won't tell the difference. But if you are sitting still like hunting or fishing they are great. Battery only lasts about 4 hrs. maximum.
customer_reviews.author: CaptRic

customer_reviews.title: These heated insoles are not usable unless your shoe/boot has ...
customer_reviews.text: These heated insoles are not usable unless your shoe/boot has a much larger than average inner height in the toe. They have to be cut to fit the length and width of the shoe/boot. This makes them non-returnable for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Surprised to say they work pretty good! Wasn’t really cold out
customer_reviews.text: Out hunting this morning and my feet got cold. Reached in my pocket and turned on the heat. Surprised to say they work pretty good! Wasn’t really cold out, around 25 or so and had on my lightweight boots. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: They work !
customer_reviews.text: I use mine in slippers and they work well. A little inconvenience in charging them and they are stiff with a high center, but I am pleased if they got up.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with these. They work well, and he likes that they have a remote and different settings. The only thing he wishes were different is that the batteries would last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My father's Christmas gift since he always has cold feet!!! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn M Juliette

customer_reviews.title: dont work
customer_reviews.text: will have to send back to the manufactor to get checked out or they did not fully explain operation of their product the insole doesnot heat fast who knows , this product could be good if it works but mine didn't
customer_reviews.author: chuck miller

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great but hurt my heals, I walk a lot hunting in them
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: I did use these soles in very cold conditions, this is the reason I purchased them. I used them snowmobiling, the temp was -15 F. The operating time for me was around four hours on medium. I think they are a good product as long as they survive the amount of charge times stated.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN BRIGGS

customer_reviews.title: Thermacell Heated Insoles
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my husbands feet nice and warm in our colder winters in Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: MMP

customer_reviews.title: They simply don't work
customer_reviews.text: They turn on to the inactive state but never actually activate when I hit the button. I sent a message to the seller and received no reply. Thanks for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Huppert

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! He has no feeling in his one leg and foot so these make it safe for him to be outside in the cold weather without fear of his foot freezing and him not knowing it. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Squeaky

customer_reviews.title: If they heated up they would have been wort the money...they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Remote and insoles all light up and blink at diol evens of operation per the instructions but only heated up first use(about a 2 hour hunt)....after that everything lights up but does not heat up
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work fine. The battery runs down fairly fast so was probably not worth the $120.00
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hays

customer_reviews.title: Remote junk
customer_reviews.text: Just got them yesterday. I charged them up. Went out hunting and the remote don't work. It was working just fine the day before. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: John W. Hite

customer_reviews.title: meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Satisfaction with this product – perhaps more than most items – is dependent upon your expectations. It provides the subtle absence of cold rather than the dramatic presence of heat. I’m very happy with them. They're not only valuable for outdoor activities but also for spending time standing on a cold garage/workshop floor.
customer_reviews.author: T.C. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: They are warm on the feet, just hope the ...
customer_reviews.text: They are warm on the feet, just hope the batteries can hold up for the long periods of time outside in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Todd K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i use this for winter hunting and had kept my feet very warm
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

product_meta.title: Thermacell Original Heated Insoles
product_meta.description: ThermaCELL Heated Insoles. ThermaCELL Heated Insoles are a serious heating product for people who need it most. These cutting edge wireless remote-controlled insoles warm your feet to the perfect temperatures (between 100F and 111F) so they don't overheat, then sweat and freeze. There is also a No Heat setting so the heat can be temporarily turned off and on as needed. These insoles are also made out of breathable polyurethane foam that conducts heat efficiently, offers great shape retention and shock absorbency for all-day comfort. Requires 2 Rechargeable Lithium Polymer batteries (Included) Includes: Remote control (battery included), Global Charger, Drawstring Travel Bag, Instruction Booklet Adjustable Temperature Materials: Polyurethane foam, Lithium-Ion Polymer Battery
feature_bullets: Powered by rechargeable, built-in lithium-ion Polymer batteries
Can be trimmed to fit almost any shoe size
Fit easily into shoes or boot
